elements.description:
`furo-data-table`
Read only data table based on the response type from the rest api spec.


Custom property | Description | Default  | Fallback
----------------|-------------|----------|----------
`--furo-data-table-header-background` | Background color of the header row | --surface | white
`--furo-data-table-header-on-background` | Color of the header row | --on-surface | black
`--furo-data-table-background` | Background color of the element | --surface | white
`--furo-data-table-on-background` | Color of the element | --on-surface | black
`--data-table-separator` | Color of separator lines | --separator | rgba(0, 0, 0, .12)


Tags: data-ui

properties.name: cols
properties.description:
Column meta information
used to render all the column stuff

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Typedefinition of row items
REST SPEC Type
Supported __ui flags: "flags": ["align-right"] e.g. for numeric values
e.g. task.Task.[type]

properties.name: fields
properties.description:
list of fields which columns should be displayed
comma separated field list

properties.name: sortableFields
properties.description:
list of sortable fields
comma separated field list

properties.name: singleSelection
properties.description:
if True the single row selection mode is activated
No bulk action or checkboxes are available

properties.name: hideHead
properties.description: if True the header row is unvisible

methods.name: _attachDom
methods.description: Auto append fbp for Polymer

methods.name: firstUpdated
methods.description: Event listening and type check

methods.name: _FBPTriggerWire
methods.description: Triggers a wire

methods.name: _FBPTraceWires
methods.description:
Log all triggered wires for this component. This function may help you at debugging.
Select your element in the dev console and call `$0._FBPTraceWires()`

methods.name: _FBPDebug
methods.description:
Get information for the triggered wire. This function may help you at debugging.
Select your element in the dev console and call `$0._FBPDebug('--dataReceived')`

params.name: openDebugger
params.description: opens the debugger console, so you can inspect your component.

methods.name: _appendFBP
methods.description: parses the dom for flowbased programming tags

methods.name: _FBPReady
methods.description: flow is ready lifecycle method

methods.name: _pathGet
methods.description:
Reads a value from a path.  If any sub-property in the path is `undefined`,
this method returns `undefined` (will never throw.

params.name: root
params.description: Object from which to dereference path from

return.desc:
Value at path, or `undefined` if the path could not be
 fully dereferenced.

methods.name: _pathSet
methods.description:
Sets a value to a path.  If any sub-property in the path is `undefined`,
this method will no-op.

params.name: root
params.description: Object from which to dereference path from

return.desc: The normalized version of the input path

methods.name: _split
methods.description:
Splits a path into an array of property names. Accepts either arrays
of path parts or strings.

Example:

```
split(['foo.bar', 0, 'baz'])  // ['foo', 'bar', '0', 'baz']
split('foo.bar.0.baz')        // ['foo', 'bar', '0', 'baz']
```

methods.name: _checkType
methods.description:
SPEC Type checker
Builds the column Array for the inner template

methods.name: _init
methods.description: Prepare columns form attribute fields

methods.name: _applySortableFields
methods.description:
parses the attribute sortable-fields
and creates an internal array of sortable fields

methods.name: _internalAddColumn
methods.description: Internal addColumn

methods.name: bindData
methods.description: Binds data-object to data-table

methods.name: render
methods.description: Template rendering

methods.name: triggerNavigation
methods.description: Integration of furo-navigation-pad keys

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Triggers wire name --focus for internal use

methods.name: first
methods.description: Focuses the first table row element

methods.name: select
methods.description: Focuses the first table row element

methods.name: last
methods.description: Focuses the last table row element

methods.name: prev
methods.description: Focuses previous table row element

methods.name: next
methods.description: Focuses next table row element

methods.name: _selectRow
methods.description: Handles table row select

methods.name: _focusRowByIndex
methods.description:
Comfort function to focus a specific table row
by index

elements.name: FuroDataTable

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Typedefinition of row items
REST SPEC Type
Supported __ui flags: "flags": ["align-right"] e.g. for numeric values
e.g. task.Task.[type]

attributes.name: fields
attributes.description:
list of fields which columns should be displayed
comma separated field list

attributes.name: sortable-fields
attributes.description:
list of sortable fields
comma separated field list

attributes.name: single-selection
attributes.description:
if True the single row selection mode is activated
No bulk action or checkboxes are available

attributes.name: hide-head
attributes.description: if True the header row is unvisible

events.name: checkstate-changed
events.description:
Fired when a row is checked or unchecked
Payload: Array of raw Entities

events.name: data-loaded
events.description:
Fired when inject data has successfully finished.
Payload: this

events.name: spec-error
events.description:
spec-error
Fired when spec could not be loaded
detail payload: {string} spec name

events.name: tablerow-selected
events.description:
Fired when a table row has been selected.
Payload: Entity

elements.description:
`furo-data-hide-content` hides content in dependency to a boolean field value. It is also possible to call the `hide()` and `show()` methods to show and hide the content and update the value. ```
some content
```

properties.name: _hidden
properties.description: Internal variable to update the attribute, which triggers the css

properties.name: hideOnFalse
properties.description: Hide element on false instead of true

methods.name: _FBPReady
methods.description:
Livecycle method
This method is called, when the wires are ready.
And triggers the --FBPready wire. This does *not* respect a lit updateComplete

methods.name: _split
methods.description:
Splits a path into an array of property names. Accepts either arrays
of path parts or strings.

Example:

```
split(['foo.bar', 0, 'baz'])  // ['foo', 'bar', '0', 'baz']

methods.name: bindData
methods.description:
Bind a entity field to the date-input. You can use the entity even when no data was received.
When you use `@-object-ready` from a `furo-data-object` which emits a EntityNode, just bind the field with `--entity(*.fields.fieldname)`

methods.name: _checkInversedState
methods.description: inverses the bool based on hindOnFalse

methods.description: hides the content

methods.name: show
methods.description: shows the content

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggle the current visibility state.

hided
Fired when the content gets hided

events.name: showed

showed

events.name: value-changed
events.description:
value-changed
Fired when the visibility changed

detail payload: {Boolean} current visibility state
